## Multi-Armed Bandit problems

[Problem Set 2](ps2_answers.html) replicates an empirical evaluation of Thompson Sampling [@chapelle2011empirical]. To run the simulation from the command line, simply execute the command below:

```{bash, eval=F}
git clone https://github.com/pat-alt/reinforcement_learning.git
cd reinforcement_learning
...
```
